message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_TYPE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Unable to find evidence type matching code: %1s.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_EFFECTIVE_FROM_UNSPECIFIED
message.locale: The effective from date must be specified for this evidence.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_TYPE_VERSION_EFFECTIVE_AT_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Unable to find evidence type version matching code: %1s; effective at: %2s.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_PARSE_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION
message.locale: The given evidence failed to validate against the evidence schema. XML Schema validation error is: %1s.
